item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 8, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Multiple new macOS sandbox escape vulnerabilities (326 points | 83 comments)
2. Mitochondria Are Alive (19 points | 1 comment)
3. Stabilizing the Obra Dinn 1-bit dithering process (2017) (254 points | 47 comments)
4. Colors of the Court – NBA Uniforms (22 points | 12 comments)

6. Parsing arguments in Rust with no dependencies (14 points | 2 comments)
7. Λ-2D: An Exploration of Drawing as Programming Language (106 points | 32 comments)
8. LoRA vs. Full Fine-Tuning: An Illusion of Equivalence (137 points | 31 comments)
9. Aviator (YC S21) Is hiring engineers to build a DevEx platform ( | hide)
10. How to self-host all of Bluesky except the AppView (for now) (60 points | 30 comments)
11. Perceptually lossless (talking head) video compression at 22kbit/s (152 points | 90 comments)
12. Functional Programming in Go (28 points | 11 comments)
13. The Cybergypsies (Indra Sinha, 1999) (6 points | discuss)
14. Gravity's Eastern Voyage (11 points | 1 comment)

17. Show HN: Nondeterministic finite queued dialog automaton (10 points | discuss)
18. Claude Shannon: Mathematician, Engineer, Genius and Juggler? (2017) (92 points | 35 comments)
19. The 'Invisibility Cloak' – Slash-Proc Magic (39 points | 3 comments)
20. Toy Models of Superposition (2022) (11 points | discuss)
21. FDA proposes ending use of oral phenylephrine as OTC nasal decongestant (168 points | 332 comments)
22. The Weeds Are Winning (38 points | 50 comments)
23. Genetic repair via CRISPR can inadvertently introduce other defects (24 points | 2 comments)
24. Practical Radio Circuits (2003) [pdf] (121 points | 30 comments)
25. The evolution of nepotism in academia, 1088-1800 (51 points | 54 comments)
26. Functional ultrasound through the skull (231 points | 79 comments)
27. The Charms of Catastrophe (1978) (11 points | 4 comments)
28. Consistently faster and smaller compressed bitmaps with Roaring (2016) (47 points | 6 comments)
29. Mushroom Color Atlas (299 points | 29 comments)
30. Cops suspect iOS 18 iPhones are communicating to force reboots (75 points | 150 comments)
